quests.name: A Growing Mystery
objectives: Talk to Cogsworth.

Help Cogsworth restore the castle's rose garden.
  ‧ Search the West Wing to find the Rose Seeds.
  ‧ ‧ Visit the Prince's rooms.
Pick up the Rose Seeds.
Return to the garden center.

Clear obstacles from the garden and plant the Rose Seeds in their designated plots.
  ‧ One Rose Seed goes in each garden plot.
  ‧ ‧ Plot 1.
  ‧ ‧ Plot 2.
  ‧ ‧ Plot 3.
  ‧ ‧ Plot 4.
Ask Cogsworth what's wrong with the rose bushes.

Find the Ingredients for Rose Fertilizer in the garden.
  ‧ 10 Castle Softwood.
  ‧ 3 Rich Soil.
  ‧ 3 Castle Stone.
Craft the Rose Fertilizer.
Use the Rose Fertilizer to add it to your Watering Can.

Water the rosebushes.
  ‧ First rosebush.
  ‧ Second rosebush.
  ‧ Third rosebush.
  ‧ Fourth rosebush.
Gather the 6 Rainbow Roses.
Show the Rainbow Roses to Cogsworth.

Place the Rainbow Roses in the empty vases in the hall.
  ‧ First Vase.
  ‧ Second Vase.
  ‧ Third Vase.

Pickup the items that have appeared:
  ‧ Domestic Manual Page 2.
  ‧ First Enigmatic Key.
Talk with Cogsworth.

quests.name: A Guide to Better Castle-Keeping
objectives:
Cogsworth seems to have big plans for a party. Check in and see how he's doing.
  ‧ Talk to Cogsworth.
Go to the cellar in the garden to find the Fine Cutlery.
Retrieve the Fine Cutlery from the garden cellar storage.
Put the Fine Cutlery on the table near the piano.
Go talk with Lumiere.

Explore the castle to find the Ingredients:
  ‧ Oyster.
  ‧ Creepy Crawly Crab.
  ‧ Chilling Cucumber.
  ‧ Booy√®re Cheese.
  ‧ Screamed Butter.

Cook:
  ‧ Charcuterie Board.
Place the Charcuterie Board on the table near the piano.
Check in with Cogsworth about the party preparations.

Search the garden and destroy the statues to find the materials:
  ‧ 8 Castle Softwood.
  ‧ 3 Rainbow Rose Bouquets.
  ‧ 3 Castle Detritus.
Craft the Rose Garlands. (There is a Crafting Station in the garden).
Place the Rose Garlands in the hall near the windows.
Let Cogsworth know that everything is ready.
Put on the Masquerade Mask you found.
Take a picture with Cogsworth and Lumiere in front of the Rose Garlands.
Listen to Cogsworth and Lumiere reminiscing.
Ask Cogsworth (and Lumiere) what's next.
Return to Dreamlight Valley with Lumiere.
Return to Dreamlight Valley.
Welcome Lumiere to the Valley.
Go inside the Beast's home.
Speak to The Beast to re-introduce friends.
Bring the letter to Cogsworth.
Return to Dreamlight Valley with Cogsworth.
Return to the Valley.
Welcome Cogsworth to Dreamlight Valley.
Go into the Beast's house.
Speak with Cogsworth to complete the reunion.
